Posts.Content:
Hi sandy I am not going to lie and say I am not worried about
 it coss I am but at the same time I have tried to not look it up on the net coss I know I will scare my self to death,to be honest it's not the swelling that worries me its the other things that come with it like the large pin holes in my areola and the dent in the breast the pin holes was there b4 but the dent is a new thing that's only come up over the last month or so ago I don't have any pain in my breast but I do get a bit of discomfort in my collar bone every now and then and with that lump on it also,but there is something else which I didn't think it was even connected I get an aching in my shoulder and down my arm and god I'm I tired all the time I mean I can sleep all night and day if I get the chance which is not like me at all I just hope they sort it out this time coss the swelling making me walk to one side lol only kidding :) milly 43
Posts.Title: breast cyst so i was told

Posts.Content:
hi there this is my very first time on here or any other forums so please be kind,i am just over the big 40 and a few months ago I woke up to find my right breast to be swollen red I was surprised that it was like this anyway I waited for a month or so b4 I went to see the doctor I had a lump and it felt hard but no pain so as the time went on it got bigger so I did go see my gp she said it is more likely to be a cyst but I should be seen within 2 weeks I was seen 2 weeks later I had a mammogram done and scan when I was having my scan done the lady said I would just like the doctor to see this b4 you go and see the consultant upstairs anyway she came out and told me to go upstairs to see to doctor so I sat waiting it was the end of the day and I was the last one to see him he told me that it was a cyst and the I was fine I was soÂ happy that it wasn't the c word I never asked anything about
 it and plus I was rush out of the door.
Posts.Title: breast cyst so i was told

Posts.Content: Hi there thank you for your message I have just been back to see the doctor today she told me that the report from the hospital said I had a lot of thicking and a cyst,in my right anyway she has seen how swollen it is and the redness and everything else lol told me she is not happy with it and has sent request back to the hospital for them to see me and find out what's going on so I am pleased that she doesn't think I am going mad lol so now I will just have to wait till then.
